attributes.action: The UK government must not allow Amira Abase to return to the uk.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government must not grant Abase access to the UK.  

Had ISIS been successful, Abase would not be requesting to return to the UK. 

Abase has betrayed her country, betrayed her people and now wants the UK to support her.  

The government must take firm stand in relation to uk citizens supporting ISIS.
attributes.background:
Abase fled the UK with two Bethnal Green Academy pals, Kadiza Sultana and Begum, in February 2015.
The three girls all married ISIS fighters.
